attributes.action: demand that Chelsea Football Club reinstates the barred away season ticket holders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Chelsea's most loyal fans are the away season ticket holders. Following an administration error, around 100 fans have been thrown off the scheme. It makes no sense to abuse your most loyal customers, our club deserves the best support it can get

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
